trans-unit.source: Represents a class that maintains a set of context items published into the designer editing context.
This class is abstract.

Each <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem> contained in the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager> represents a piece of transient state in a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner>.
Initiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether the item manager contains an item of the specified type.
The type of item to check for.
`true` if the context contains an instance of the specified item type; otherwise, `false`.
itemType is `null`.
Returns a value that indicates whether the item manager contains an item of the specified type.

This generic method invokes the abstract <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager.Contains%2A> method, which must be implemented for this method to provide the type checking functionality.
The type of item to check for.
`true` if the context contains an instance of the specified item type; otherwise, `false`.
When overridden in a derived class, enumerates the context items in the editing context.
This enumeration includes prior layers unless the enumerator hits an isolated layer.
Returns <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref>, which contains an enumeration of context items.
Represents a helper method that returns the target object for a delegate.
If the delegate was created to proxy a generic delegate, this method returns the original object, not the proxy.
The callback for the desired target.
Returns <xref href="System.Object"></xref>, which contains the target object of the callback.
callback is `null`.
When overridden in a derived class, returns an instance of the requested item type.
If there is no context item with the given type, an empty item will be created.
The type of item to return.
Returns <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref>, which contains a context item of the requested type.
If there is no item in the context for this type, a default one is created.
itemType is `null`.
Returns an instance of the requested item type.
If there is no context item with the given type, an empty item will be created.
This generic method invokes the abstract <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager.GetValue%2A> method, which must be implemented for this method to provide the get type functionality.
The type of item to return.
Returns <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref>, which contains a context item of the requested type.
If there is no item in the context for this type, a default one is created.

Represents a helper method that invokes the protected <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem.OnItemChanged(System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext,System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem)"></xref> method.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> in use.
The new <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref>.
The previous <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref>.
context, item, or previousItem is `null`.
Represents a helper method that performs delegate removals and that unwraps delegates that are proxies to generic callbacks.
Use this method in your implementations of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager.Unsubscribe%2A> method.
The existing delegate.
The delegate to be removed from existing.
Returns , which contains the new delegate that should be assigned to existing.
When overridden in a derived class, sets a context item to the specified value.
Do not pass a `null` value.
To set a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True) to an empty value, create an instance of the item using a default constructor.
The value to set into the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem)"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, adds an event callback that is invoked when a context item of the specified item type changes.
The type of item you want to subscribe to.
The that is invoked when contextItemType changes.
contextItemType or callback is `null`.
Adds an event callback that is invoked when a context item of the specified item type changes.
A that is invoked when contextItemType changes.
The type of item you want to subscribe to.
contextItemType or callback is `null`.
When overridden in a derived class, removes a subscription.
The type of context item to remove the callback from.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback"></xref> to remove.
callback is `null`.
Removes a subscription.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback`1"></xref> to remove.
The type of context item to remove the callback from.
callback is `null`.
Enumerates the context items in the editing context.
Returns <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref>.
